mapper.select: SELECT msg.*, text.content as text, file.path as file FROM messages msg LEFT JOIN message_text text ON msg.seq_id = text.msg_id LEFT JOIN message_file file ON msg.seq_id = file.msg_id WHERE msg.seq_id = #{seqId}

SELECT msg.*, text.content as text, file.path as file FROM messages msg LEFT JOIN message_text text ON msg.seq_id = text.msg_id LEFT JOIN message_file file ON msg.seq_id = file.msg_id WHERE ( sender = #{sender} AND receiver = #{receiver} ) OR ( sender = #{receiver} AND receiver = #{sender} ) ORDER BY seq_id LIMIT #{pageStart}, ${pageCount}
